title: List of Chelsea F.C. managers - Wikipedia
snippet: Chelsea have had 32 permanent managers/head coaches (of whom four also served as player-manager), six interim managers and six caretakers. Ron Suart has served as both caretaker and interim manager.

title: Chelsea Coaching Staff - The Chelsea Chronicle
snippet: They then reunited at Leicester in 2023 and are now at Chelsea. Also played alongside Maresca at Palermo from 2014 and 2016. Photo by Plumb Images/Leicester City FC via Getty Images · Danny Walker previously worked under Maresca with Manchester City’s Development squad before joining Peterborough United, and then as Leicester’s first-team coach in 2023.
